summary.para: The NET_ADDRESS_FORMAT enumeration specifies the format of a network address returned by the function.

remarks.para: The NET_ADDRESS_FORMAT enumeration is defined on Windows Vista and later.
The structure returned by the function.

summary.para: The format of the network address is unspecified.
The format of the network address is a DNS name.
The format of the network address is a string in Internet standard dotted-decimal notation for IPv4.
The format of the network address is a string in Internet standard hexadecimal encoding for IPv6.
